channel.title: Battlefield 3's System Requirements
channel.description:
Minimum System Requirements
OS: Windows Vista (SP2) 32-bit Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core (Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Athlon X2 2.7 GHz) Memory: 2 GB Hard Drive: 20 GB Graphics Card (NVIDIA): DirectX 10.0 graphics card with 512 MB RAM (NVIDIA GeForce 8, 9, 200, 300, 400 or 500 series with NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT or higher performance) Graphics Card (ATI): DirectX 10.0 graphics card with 512 MB RAM (AMD ATI Radeon 3000, 4000, 5000 or 6000 series with AMD ATI Radeon 3870 or higher performance) Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Keyboard and Mouse DVD ROM Drive
Recommended System Requirements
OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Quad-core CPU Memory: 4 GB Hard Drive: 20 GB Graphics Card: DirectX 11 graphics card with 1024 MB RAM (NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 or AMD ATI Radeon 6950) Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Keyboard and Mouse DVD ROM Drive
edit: here's a snazzy gpu chart made by nvidia ![](upload://9XdU7JvhRGzxk2cwUCPhfX5Gvq5.png)

item.title: Battlefield 3's System Requirements
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
That, and they can’t use assets from a 6 year old game, especially considering how much effort went into graphics for BF3.

Read full topic

item.title: Battlefield 3's System Requirements
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
^ I KNOW!!! I’d have preferred every vehicle be driveable. Even the civilian cars littered about the urban maps. Why? Because for the fuck of it.

Bloodshot:

Because MW2 had map packs from CoD 4?

But IW ripped the levels from CoD 4 with some touch ups. This was a completely different engine so they had to redesign the levels completely (aside from the layout).

Well, they could have still copypasta’d if that were the only factor.

I’m betting the major renovations would probably be due to new player size, speed, jump height, mobility, and view distance. Plus there’s all the ways that the vehicles have changed.

Obviously implementing destruction is a huge factor.

I’m expecting these maps to play completely differently than their BF2 counterparts, despite their similar layouts. Anyone hoping for a replica or a nostalgia trip should stop holding their breath.

Read full topic

item.description:
I haven’t checked the FPS yet, but it runs pretty smooth on Ultra with 2x fsaa.

Also a teammate hit a heli with a crane and the wreckage fell down and rolled over 3 enemies that were trying to kill me. It was O_o worthy.

item.title: Battlefield 3's System Requirements
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
I was on Operation firestorm, and decided to snipe even though i usually never do. I climbed the crane near my base and walked to the edge with the hook - some enemy had a transport heli with a full squad in it, and the guy didn’t seem to like snipers - so he took his heli and nose dived right into me trying to run me over.

He didn’t realize he can’t get me through the triangular holes - so he flies right towards me, slammed into the crane and made a DING, then it slowly flips over and he hits the building below and blows up, it counts as a TK of his entire squad and he gets kicked. I lol’ed for several minutes afterwards.

Read full topic

item.title: Battlefield 3's System Requirements
item.dc:creator: CTID
item.description:
There’s nothing quite as exhilarating as walking though the Forest in Caspian and exiting just in time to see a jet spinning through the air toward the ground and crash about 15 feet to my front right. Was fucking awesome.

item.title: Battlefield 3's System Requirements
item.dc:creator: ac3d
item.description:
There was an attack chopper trying to stop me from capping a base, I managed to hit him with the unguided rpg, he lands on the ground, but the chopper has already taken too much damage and explodes, killing him. He then says that I have no skill.

Read full topic

item.title: Battlefield 3's System Requirements
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
So I was playing Caspian today and there was this damn helicopter flying around and killing a lot of people and every time I tried to shoot it down with the stinger it would deploy flares. I decided to give up and switched back to the RPG and was going to a different flag. I saw it was just a little ways away from me and decided for the hell of it to try and hit it with my RPG. Just as I was about to fire, a jet comes though, I’m pretty sure he was on the same team as the heli, and clips the helicopter with his wing, blowing it up. It was awesome.

Read full topic
